answer:
Unfortunately the Ministry of Health only prints one Child Health Passport per baby born each year and there is no extra stock.  You may want to download and print the passport at the following link: http://www.health.gov.bc.ca/library/publications/year/2016/child-health-passport-eng-2016.pdf. 
You can request a copy of your child's immunization records from your local public health unit.  You can find the contact information for your local public health unit here.
- Immunization Nurse

question: I misplaced my daughters health passport Is there my way to get another one with the information that you have in your system?
